title: Greek Prepaids
body: I am from Greece and just bought a couple of prepaid cards but I saw that they are for eune after I got home but I play on west. Is there a way to redeem them or get the RP on my EUW account?

replies.body: Prepaid RP Cards are region specific and can't be used in an unsupported region.  I can't make any guarantees, but we'd like to look into this!  Reach out to us in a [support ticket ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and we'll look into your specific issue individually.  Our billing team will respond asap!
